casebody.data:
HARBOR RECOVERY CORPORATION v. HARBOR REALTY ASSOCIATES ET AL. (14796)

Dupont, C. J., and O’Connell and Landau, Js.

Argued December 6, 1995 decision released January 9, 1996 Peter A. Berdon, with whom, on the brief, was Pasquale Young, for the appellant (defendant Michael R. Caporale, Jr.). Mark A. Rosenblum, with whom, on the brief, was Brendan T. Flynn, for the appellee (plaintiff). PER CURIAM.

The judgment is affirmed.
